s1paragraph1: Unlocking Success with Dwayne Johnson: Determination, Humility, and Hard Work
s2paragraph1: Wake up determined. Go to bed satisfied.
s3paragraph1: Always asked, ‘What’s the key to success?’ The key is, there is no key. Be humble, hungry, and always be the hardest worker in the room.
s4paragraph1: Success isn’t overnight. It’s when every day you get a little better than the day before. It all adds up.
s5paragraph1: The first step to achieving your goal, is to take a moment to respect your goal. Know what it means to you to achieve it.
s6paragraph1: There is no substitute for hard work. Always be humble and hungry.
s7paragraph1: All successes begin with Self-Discipline. It starts with you.
s9paragraph1: One hard day of work proves you have heart. But day after day is what proves you have maturity and commitment.
